object_finder.description: Finds a specific map object by its ID and returns its coordinates.

pathfinder_v7.description: An enhanced pathfinding tool that reads map markers to account for off-screen objects, making it reliable for long-distance pathing. It can also find paths to tiles adjacent to impassable destinations. Version 7 fixes a bug where the algorithm failed when the player's starting x-coordinate was 0.

extra_impassable_coordinates.description: A JSON string of a list of additional [x, y] coordinates to treat as impassable.
